ANU.name: Noel Campbell
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
ANU.biography: He joined the Australian Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade as a diplomatic trainee in 1975 and subsequently served at Australian Embassies in Buenos Aires, Lima, Geneva and Washington. In the intervening periods he served in several Branches of the Department in Canberra, most recently as Assistant Secretary, International Organizations Branch (2012-14), Chief of Protocol (2005-2006) and Deputy Legal Adviser (1997-1998).
